title: The Worlds Greatest Ballads (3CD) (320kbps) (AciDToX8)
description:
The Worlds Greatest Ballads (3CD) 

                   Pop, Rock, Disco, Lo-Fi | 101 Distributions

             320 kbps | MP3 | unmixed | 2013-08-01 | 03:49:27 | 530 Mb



Featuring no less than 18 UK #1 hit singles, global smashes included range from Michael Jackson "I Just Can't Stop Loving You" to Celine Dion's world-conquering theme from Titanic "My Heart Must Go On"; along with the debut single and 1985 chart-topper from Whitney Houston "Saving All My Love For You", George Michael's debut solo #1 "Careless Whisper" and the heart-wrenching rendition of "Nothing Compares 2 U" from Sinead O'Connor. Sony. 55 tracks total.
